author: Special Correspondent
text:
Senior Congress leader and former Union Minster of State V.Narayanasamy, on Friday, ruled out that any of his family members would be contesting the Assembly elections.

Referring to reports that his daughter would contest the Assembly elections in Puducherry in a section of the media, he said, “ We rejected the plea of Mahila Congress to field my daughter. Yet, some vested interests are spreading the rumour.”
title: Family members not contesting, says Narayanasamy
